code: import React from'react';import{Container,Button}from'react-bootstrap';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import{logout}from'../redux/actions/user';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Dashboard=function Dashboard(_ref){var history=_ref.history;var dispatch=useDispatch();var userLogin=useSelector(function(state){return state.userLogin;});var userInfo=userLogin.userInfo;var logoutHandler=function logoutHandler(e){e.preventDefault();dispatch(logout(userInfo.email));history.push('/');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{className:"text-center my-5 py-5 ",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{className:"text-center text-primary my-5 py-5 shadow bg-light",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{children:["Hello ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-success",children:userInfo.name})," you have succesfully logged in !"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"btn btn-danger my-2 py-2",onClick:logoutHandler,children:"LOG OUT"})]})});};export default Dashboard;
